articles.title: Allison Russell, Yola, Rhiannon Giddens on Roots Music - Vulture
articles.description: Three Grammy-nominated musicians grapple with racism and respect in roots music.
articles.content: The Grammys have a problem with history. The Recording Academy loves to give awards to artists past their prime or to stuff categories full of dinosaurs rather than recognizing current innovation. Lo… [+25131 chars]
